TopicTitle: The controls to drive wheels on rovers cannot be re-bound

Articles.Content:
Reported Version: v0.1.5 (latest) | Mods: none | Can replicate without mods? Yes 
OS: Windows 10 | CPU: Intel(R) Core(TM) i5-9600K | GPU: NVIDIA RTX3080 | RAM: 16 GB

 

It is not possible to re-bind the controls to activate the motors on rover wheels (default W-S)

I am not sure which setting should affect this but I tried:

  • Walk forward/backwards (EVA)
  • Pitch (Flight)
